hymn.title: Ere from our gathering we're dismissed, dear Lord

layout.singingstanza: Ere from our gath -- ering we're dis -- missed, dear Lord, We sing a -- gain to thank Thee from our heart, For Thy dear pre -- sence and re -- fresh -- ing grace, Which Thou so rich -- ly didst to us im -- part.

lyrics.stanza: Ere from our gathering we're dismissed, dear Lord, We sing again to thank Thee from our heart, For Thy dear presence and refreshing grace, Which Thou so richly didst to us impart.
Though now the meeting's over, in Thy grace, Thy presence never will from us depart; But as the Spirit Thy sustaining strength Thou wouldst in love unceasingly impart.
Lord, may Thy presence go with us, we pray, To bear with us the burden on our heart That every moment we Thyself enjoy, Till in the coming meeting we take part.
